= What is Divel Apps =

Divel Apps is a server program that manage Divel Network system.


= Why I need to use Divel Apps =

If you need to make a Divel Network into a LAN, bussines or game club you need this. 

= Howto install Divel Apps =

# Install a operating system like RedHat Enterprise, Divel Server, CentOS, SUSE

# Install Java or OpenJDK. You can use version 6 or 7.

# Get code from Divel Apps. See Source tab.

# Get AppEngine SDK from Google Developers.

# Run it on Tomcat or Jetty

# Try it in a browser
